Package org.academiadecodigo.simplegraphics.graphics

Interface Shape

All Known Implementing Classes:
Ellipse, Line, Picture, Rectangle, Text
public interface Shape
A shape that can be drawn on a canvas.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void delete()
    Deletes the shape from screen
    void draw()
    Draws the shape
    int getHeight()
    Gets the height of the shape.
    int getWidth()
    Gets the width of the shape.
    int getX()
    Gets the leftmost x-position of the shape.
    int getY()
    Gets the topmost y-position of the shape.
    void grow​(double dw, double dh)
    Changes the size of the shape
    void paintShape​(java.awt.Graphics2D g2)
    Paints the shape

  • Method Details

    • getX

      int getX()
      Gets the leftmost x-position of the shape.
      Returns:
      the leftmost x-position

    • getY

      int getY()
      Gets the topmost y-position of the shape.
      Returns:
      the topmost y-position

    • getWidth

      int getWidth()
      Gets the width of the shape.
      Returns:
      the width

    • getHeight

      int getHeight()
      Gets the height of the shape.
      Returns:
      the height

    • draw

      void draw()
      Draws the shape

    • delete

      void delete()
      Deletes the shape from screen

    • grow

      void grow​(double dw, double dh)
      Changes the size of the shape
      Parameters:
      dw - the amount by which to resize the width on each side
      dh - the amount by which to resize the height on each side

    • paintShape

      void paintShape​(java.awt.Graphics2D g2)
      Paints the shape
      Parameters:
      g2 - the graphics object
